mapper.sql: id, time, cardLevel, cardName, level, roomId, userName, text
mapper.insert: insert into t_danMus (time, cardLevel, cardName, level, roomId, userName, text) values (#{time, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{cardLevel, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{cardName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{level, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roomId, jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{userName, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{text, jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select userName FROM t_danMus AS t1 JOIN (SELECT ROUND(RAND() * ((SELECT MAX(id) FROM t_danMus) - (SELECT MIN(id) FROM t_danMus)) + (SELECT MIN(id) FROM t_danMus)) AS id) AS t2 WHERE t1.id >= t2.id ORDER BY t1.id LIMIT 1
mapper.insert: insert into t_access (ip, counts) values (#{ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, 1)
mapper.select: select counts from t_access where ip = #{ip, jdbcType=VARCHAR}
